name: convincingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is convincing (= making you believe that something is true or right): She spoke convincingly of the need for a more humane prison system. She did talk convincingly about what needed to be done.
in a way that makes it very clear who has won: They were convincingly beaten 3-1 by their opponents. None of the candidates won convincingly in either of the races. See
convincing
More examplesFewer examplesIt tastes convincingly home-made.The Welsh side have played convincingly so far this season.I don't really know how to make that point convincingly.
